thread.title: Obama Makes FRIGHTENING Promise Of What’s To Come After He Leaves Office…
thread.title_full: Obama Makes FRIGHTENING Promise Of What’s To Come After He Leaves Office…

author: Nickarama
title: Obama Makes FRIGHTENING Promise Of What’s To Come After He Leaves Office…
text:
Once upon a time there was a social justice warrior named Barack Obama. 
Somehow in a blitz of hope and change, he managed to become President of the United States, the most powerful office in the land. 
While he did things that were very damaging to the office and to the country, he didn’t quite finish off his work or the country. 
So he made a fearful promise of a whole generation of social justice warriors to come after him. 
Obama impugned the opposition by saying there’s a generation coming who “value diversity, who believe in science, who care about the environment, how they believe in not discriminating against people for their sexual orientation.” 
George Stephanopolous says, “But they didn’t come out to vote.” 
Obama responds that they did come out to vote for him, a swipe at his designated successor, the woman who was supposed to carry on his legacy but who had lost disastrously to President-elect Donald Trump. 
Obama spoke of wanting to have the same transformative power on the country as Ronald Reagan. 
But you, sir, are no Ronald Reagan. 
You lost the chance of your legacy with the election of Donald Trump. 
That generation of social justice warriors will now find themselves fighting against a sea of Americans who know who they are and what they are about. 
Here’s to real ‘hope and change’… LIKE this article?
